page.title: 12CONCERNS AND TROUBLES
page.content: {Computers}are worrying and helping many people.They are seen as a threat to jobs and as a way of taking control of our lives.Yet they are helping disabled people and making many jobs easier. We are also concerned about {peace.}People say we have had forty years of peace but in many places people are fighting. Another concern is the number of people out of work.We are worried that in a few years time we may be the ones out of work.There are somewhere between three and four million people {unemployed. {Drugs}are a growing problem with teenagers and adults.Heroin and Canabis are two of the drugs most often taken ,they can often kill or make you very ill.
